model.name: doCatch
model.title: Do Catch
model.description: Catches exceptions as part of a try, catch, finally block
model.label: error

onWhen.description: Sets an additional predicate that should be true before the onCatch is triggered. To be used for fine grained controlling whether a thrown exception should be intercepted by this exception type or not.

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Whether to disable this EIP from the route during build time. Once an EIP has been disabled then it cannot be enabled later at runtime.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
